messages.subject: Kogai
messages.msgSnippet: I am curious about kogai attributions.  When I see mumei pre-Edo kogai it seems that they fall into Ko Mino, Ko Kinko, sometimes Ko Goto but many to Goto
messages.messageBody:
I am curious about kogai attributions. When I see mumei pre-Edo kogai
it seems that they fall into Ko Mino, Ko Kinko, sometimes Ko Goto but
many to Goto Sojou. (I believe many came from the fittings Museum
Collection). What are the differentiating qualities to catagorize the
schools and why is it that so many seem to be attributed to Sojou?
Thanks for the help!
Pete Klein
